title: #142: Crime Scene Assessment of "The Staircase"
description:
The Real Crime Profile team of Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti continue with our analysis of the Kathleen Peterson case focusing on the victimology, crime scene assessment and the autopsy.


#HerNameWasKathleenPeterson

#TheStaircase

#BehaviouralAnalysis

#Victimology

#Autopsy


Please sign and share this important petition for serial stalkers and domestic violence perpetrators to be included on the Violent and Sexual Offenders Register

 https://www.change.org/p/rt-hon-theresa-may-mp-create-a-stalkers-register
